channel.title: Can you use imports as a melodic instrument?
channel.description: I dunno, just got the free trial today and was wondering if there was a way to make theh imports like an instrument?

item.title: Can you use imports as a melodic instrument?
item.dc:creator: Sylent
item.description:
No the tempo is right its a piano sample
And when i pitch it it sounds like it speeds up
Alsı the key is right too

Read full topic

item.title: Can you use imports as a melodic instrument?
item.dc:creator: Matik
item.description:
I don’t think it would be that useful since you don’t have tone and shape, but adding each singular note is possible I think. For me it would just be a hassle having to change each instrument with one note, and not having that many spaces to place those notes in would mean more drum kits would be needed.

Read full topic
